name: Eventbin
tag_list: deal-finder, coupon-organizer, coupon-site, deal-site, brand-management, marketing, startup, software, freeware, free-app, chicago, technology, tech-startup, social-media, consumer-media
overview:
Life should be about doing what you love, spending time with family and friends.

Not jumping from site to site searching for discounts and certainly not reading countless emails just to find the discounts you are interested in…

Now it can be! Put your discount and deal search on auto-pilot!! With a Free Online Coupon Organizer at Eventbin.com

Eventbin.com is a free online application for shoppers to stay on top of coupons and sales by using our patent pending and proprietary search technologies. It aggregates discounts from major coupon sites, presents discounts in a user-friendly calendar format and offers personalized subscriptions which searches for discounts on brand name products on behalf of users.

milestones.description: Joined Founder Institute Incubator Program in Chicago.
A special thanks to our members all 10,000 of them and growing!
